author: El Mercurio S.A.P.
title: Alcalde de Colchane denuncia deficiencias en trato del Ej√©rcito con comunidades ind√≠genas: "El personal no tiene la preparaci√≥n"
text:
El alcalde de Colchane, Javier Garc√≠a (Dem√≥crata), se refiri√≥ a la relaci√≥n del Ej√©rcito con la comunidad, espec√≠ficamente con la poblaci√≥n ind√≠gena, considerando el despliegue en la zona por el resguardo de la frontera norte.
El sistema de resguardo de las zonas fronterizas dispone que las Fuerzas Armadas y de Orden y Seguridad P√∫blica ejerzan las facultades para proteger las zonas de las regiones de Arica y Parinacota, de Tarapac√°, y de Antofagasta. La medida rige desde el 24 de febrero de 2023.
En conversaci√≥n con EmolTV, el jefe comunal sostuvo que "el personal del Ej√©rcito no tiene la preparaci√≥n para poder relacionarse con comunidades ind√≠genas (...) los tratos hacia nuestras comunidades han sido deficientes y poco respetuosos".
En ese sentido, el l√≠der de la comunidad se√±al√≥ que "hemos visto reclamos de vecinos que dicen haber sido maltratados verbalmente, tambi√©n discriminaci√≥n racial y por aspectos f√≠sicos".
Seg√∫n el Garc√≠a, lo anterior se debe a que "somos aimaras y eso obviamente duele. No son todos , por supuesto, pero personal de Ej√©rcito ha tenido una relaci√≥n deficiente".
Sobre el reforzamiento de la seguridad en la frontera, el alcalde sostuvo que "no considera la realidad local, el respeto de los derechos de los ni√±os ni el respeto de los derechos de l os pueblos ind√≠genas. Por eso le hemos exigido al Gobierno implementar la tarjeta de tr√°nsito vecinal ".
Revisa la entrevista completa en EmolTV

author: StockTitan
title: Christina Lake Cannabis Announces Delay in Filing its 2024 Annual Financial Statements | CLCFF Stock News
text:
Christina Lake Cannabis Announces Delay in Filing its 2024 Annual Financial Statements
Christina Lake Cannabis (CSE: CLC) has announced a delay in filing its annual financial statements for the year ended February 28, 2025. The company will miss the June 30, 2025 filing deadline due to extended audit requirements and resource constraints.
The delay is primarily attributed to increased testing needs for inventory and biological assets, complicated by higher production levels and new product lines following the Midway acquisition. The company expects to file by July 14, 2025 and has applied for a Management Cease Trade Order (MCTO) that would restrict trading by the CEO and CFO until the filings are complete.
Christina Lake Cannabis (CSE: CLC) ha annunciato un ritardo nella presentazione del bilancio annuale relativo all'esercizio chiuso al 28 febbraio 2025. La societ√† non riuscir√† a rispettare la scadenza del 30 giugno 2025 a causa di requisiti di revisione pi√π estesi e limitazioni delle risorse.
Il ritardo √® principalmente dovuto a maggiori esigenze di verifica per l'inventario e le attivit√† biologiche, complicate da livelli di produzione pi√π elevati e nuove linee di prodotto conseguenti all'acquisizione di Midway. La societ√† prevede di presentare il bilancio entro il 14 luglio 2025 e ha richiesto un Management Cease Trade Order (MCTO) che limiter√† le operazioni di trading del CEO e CFO fino al completamento delle presentazioni.
Christina Lake Cannabis (CSE: CLC) ha anunciado un retraso en la presentaci√≥n de sus estados financieros anuales correspondientes al a√±o cerrado el 28 de febrero de 2025. La compa√±√≠a no cumplir√° con la fecha l√≠mite del 30 de junio de 2025 debido a requerimientos de auditor√≠a extendidos y limitaciones de recursos.
El retraso se atribuye principalmente a mayores necesidades de pruebas para inventarios y activos biol√≥gicos, complicadas por niveles de producci√≥n m√°s altos y nuevas l√≠neas de productos tras la adquisici√≥n de Midway. La empresa espera presentar los estados financieros antes del 14 de julio de 2025 y ha solicitado una Orden de Suspensi√≥n de Comercio para la Direcci√≥n (MCTO) que restringir√° las operaciones de trading del CEO y CFO hasta que se completen las presentaciones.
Christina Lake Cannabis (CSE: CLC)Îäî 2025ÎÖÑ 2Ïõî 28Ïùº Ï¢ÖÎ£åÎêú ÌöåÍ≥ÑÏó∞ÎèÑ Ïó∞Î°Ä Ïû¨Î¨¥Ï†úÌëú Ï†úÏ∂úÏù¥ ÏßÄÏó∞Îê®ÏùÑ Î∞úÌëúÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÌöåÏÇ¨Îäî ÌôïÏû•Îêú Í∞êÏÇ¨ ÏöîÍµ¨ÏÇ¨Ìï≠Í≥º ÏûêÏõê Ï†úÌïúÏúºÎ°ú Ïù∏Ìï¥ 2025ÎÖÑ 6Ïõî 30Ïùº Ï†úÏ∂ú Í∏∞ÌïúÏùÑ ÎßûÏ∂îÏßÄ Î™ªÌï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§.
ÏßÄÏó∞Ïùò Ï£ºÏöî ÏõêÏù∏ÏùÄ Ïû¨Í≥† Î∞è ÏÉùÎ¨ºÌïôÏ†Å ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú Ï∂îÍ∞Ä Í≤ÄÏÇ¨ ÌïÑÏöîÏÑ±ÏúºÎ°ú, Midway Ïù∏Ïàò Ïù¥ÌõÑ ÏÉùÏÇ∞Îüâ Ï¶ùÍ∞ÄÏôÄ Ïã†Ï†úÌíà ÎùºÏù∏ÏúºÎ°ú Ïù∏Ìï¥ Î≥µÏû°Ìï¥Ï°åÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÌöåÏÇ¨Îäî 2025ÎÖÑ 7Ïõî 14ÏùºÍπåÏßÄ Ï†úÏ∂úÌï† ÏòàÏ†ïÏù¥Î©∞, Ï†úÏ∂ú ÏôÑÎ£å ÏãúÍπåÏßÄ CEOÏôÄ CFOÏùò Í±∞ÎûòÎ•º Ï†úÌïúÌïòÎäî Í≤ΩÏòÅÏßÑ Í±∞Îûò Ï§ëÏßÄ Î™ÖÎ†π(MCTO)ÏùÑ Ïã†Ï≤≠ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
Christina Lake Cannabis (CSE : CLC) a annonc√© un retard dans le d√©p√¥t de ses √©tats financiers annuels pour l'exercice clos le 28 f√©vrier 2025. La soci√©t√© ne respectera pas la date limite du 30 juin 2025 en raison d'exigences d'audit prolong√©es et de contraintes de ressources.
Ce retard est principalement d√ª √† des besoins accrus de v√©rification des stocks et des actifs biologiques, compliqu√©s par des niveaux de production plus √©lev√©s et de nouvelles gammes de produits suite √† l'acquisition de Midway. La soci√©t√© pr√©voit de d√©poser ses √©tats financiers d'ici le 14 juillet 2025 et a demand√© une ordonnance de suspension de n√©gociation de la direction (MCTO) qui restreindra les transactions du PDG et du directeur financier jusqu'√† la finalisation des d√©p√¥ts.
Christina Lake Cannabis (CSE: CLC) hat eine Verz√∂gerung bei der Einreichung des Jahresabschlusses f√ºr das zum 28. Februar 2025 endende Gesch√§ftsjahr angek√ºndigt. Das Unternehmen wird die Frist zum 30. Juni 2025 aufgrund erh√∂hter Pr√ºfungsanforderungen und Ressourcenengp√§ssen nicht einhalten k√∂nnen.
Die Verz√∂gerung ist haupts√§chlich auf den erh√∂hten Pr√ºfungsaufwand f√ºr Inventar und biologische Verm√∂genswerte zur√ºckzuf√ºhren, der durch h√∂here Produktionsmengen und neue Produktlinien nach der Midway-√úbernahme erschwert wird. Das Unternehmen plant die Einreichung bis zum 14. Juli 2025 und hat einen Management Cease Trade Order (MCTO) beantragt, der den Handel durch den CEO und CFO bis zum Abschluss der Einreichungen einschr√§nkt.
- None.
- Delay in filing annual financial statements beyond regulatory deadline
- Management Cease Trade Order (MCTO) application restricting CEO and CFO trading
- Resource constraints affecting audit completion
- Increased complexity in financial reporting due to Midway acquisition
VANCOUVER, British Columbia, July 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Christina Lake Cannabis Corp. ("CLC" or the "Company") (CSE: CLC) announced today that it will not be filing its annual financial statements, accompanying management's discussion and analysis and related chief executive officer ("CEO") and chief financial officer ("CFO") certifications for the financial year ended February 28, 2025 (collectively, the "Annual Filings"), within the period prescribed for the filing of such documents under Parts 4, 5 and 6 of National Instrument 51-102 Continuous Disclosure Obligations and pursuant to National Instrument 52-109 Certification of Disclosure in Issuers' Annual and Interim Filings, namely within 120 days of year-end, being June 30, 2025 (the "Filing Deadline").
The delay at CLC is due to the audit taking longer than expected, primarily because of the high level of testing required and the limited availability of staff resources. The Company's material item on its balance sheet is inventory and biological assets. Given the increased production levels over the past year and the introduction of additional product lines following the Midway acquisition, the process of costing and inventory allocation is taking longer than originally anticipated. Further, the financings completed in connection with the Midway acquisition earlier in 2024 have added to the workload, requiring additional time to ensure accuracy of the financial statements.
CLC is working closely with its auditor DMCL LLP and is making every effort to submit the Annual Filings in a timely fashion and expects to file no later than July 14, 2025, and will issue a news release announcing the completion of such filings at that time.
CLC CEO Mark Aiken stated, "We support the provision of extra time to allow auditors to satisfactorily complete the 2024 audit and ensure that the financial statements are accurate in all respects."
The Company is providing this default announcement in accordance with National Policy 12-203 Management Cease Trade Orders ("NP 12-203"). The Company has made an application to the British Columbia Securities Commission, as principal regulator of the Company, a management cease trade order ("MCTO") under NP 12-203 in respect of the default regarding the Annual Filings. The MCTO will prohibit the CEO and the CFO from trading in securities of CLC for so long as the Annual Filings are not filed. The issuance of the MCTO, if issued, does not affect the ability of persons other than the CEO and the CFO of the Company to trade in the Company's securities. The application for the MCTO remains subject to the risk factors described in "Forward Looking Information and Risk Factors" below, including the risk that the MCTO application may not be successful or may not be completed prior to a securities commission issuing a failure-to-file cease trade order against the Company following the Filing Deadline.
The Company confirms that it intends to satisfy the provisions of the alternative information guidelines found at sections 9 and 10 of NP 12-203 respecting Cease Trade Orders for Continuous Disclosure Defaults for so long as it remains in default as a result of the late filing of the Annual Filings. During the period of default, the Company will issue biweekly default status reports in the form of further news releases, which will also be filed on SEDAR. The Company confirms that there are no insolvency proceedings against it as of the date of this news release. The Company also confirms that there is no other material information concerning the affairs of the Company that has not been generally disclosed as of the date of this news release.
ABOUT CLC
Christina Lake Cannabis is a licensed producer of cannabis under the Cannabis Act. It has secured a standard cultivation license and corresponding processing amendment from Health Canada (March 2020 and August 2020, respectively) as well as a research and development license (early 2020). Christina Lake Cannabis' facility consists of a 32-acre property, which includes over 950,000 square feet of outdoor grow space, offices, propagation and drying rooms, research facilities, and a facility dedicated to processing and extraction. Christina Lake Cannabis also owns a 99-acre plot of land adjoining its principal site. CLC focuses its production on creating high quality extracts and distillate for its B2B client base with proprietary strains specifically developed for outdoor cultivation to enhance extraction quality.
For more information about CLC, please visit: www.christinalakecannabis.com
Jennifer Smith
Investor Relations and Media Inquiriesinvestors@clcannabis.com
902-229-7265
Forward Looking Information and Risk Factors
This news release contains statements and information that may constitute "forward-looking information" within the meaning of applicable securities legislation, including statements identified by the use of words such as "will", "expects", "positions", "believe", "potential" and similar words, including negatives thereof, or other similar expressions concerning matters that are not historical facts.
Such forward-looking information is not representative of historical facts or information or current condition, but instead represent only the Company's beliefs regarding future events, plans or objectives, many of which, by their nature, are inherently uncertain and outside of the Company's control. Generally, such forward-looking information can be identified by the use of forward-looking terminology such as "plans", "expects" or "does not expect", "is expected", "budget", "scheduled", "estimates", "forecasts", "intends", "anticipates" or "does not anticipate", or "believes", or variations of such words and phrases or may contain statements that certain actions, events or results "may", "could", "would", "might" or "will be taken", "will continue", "will occur" or "will be achieved". The forward-looking information contained herein may include, but is not limited to, information concerning the estimated filing date of the Annual Filings, and whether the British Columbia Securities Commission will grant the Company's application for an MCTO.
By identifying such information and statements in this manner, the Company is alerting the reader that such information and statements are subject to known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other factors that may cause the actual results, level of activity, performance or achievements of the Company to be materially different from those expressed or implied by such information and statements. Some of these risks include, but are not limited to, the risk that the Annual Filings are filed later than anticipated, the risk that the Company's application for an MCTO is not successful for any reason, in which case there is a risk that trading in the Company's securities may halted by the Canadian Securities Exchange and/or cease traded temporarily by the Canadian securities commissions after the Filing Deadline until such time as the Annual Filings are filed on SEDAR.
Although the Company has attempted to identify important factors that could cause actual results to differ materially from those contained in the forward-looking information, there may be other factors that cause results not to be as anticipated, estimated or intended.
In connection with the forward-looking information contained in this news release, the Company has made certain assumptions. Although the Company believes that the assumptions and factors used in preparing, and the expectations contained in, the forward-looking information and statements are reasonable, undue reliance should not be placed on such information and statements, and no assurance or guarantee can be given that such forward-looking information and statements will prove to be accurate, as actual results and future events could differ materially from those anticipated in such information and statements. The forward-looking information contained in this news release are made as of the date of this news release, and the Company does not undertake to update any forward-looking information and/or forward-looking statements that are contained or referenced herein, except in accordance with applicable securities laws. All subsequent written and oral forward-looking information and statements attributable to the Company or persons acting on its behalf are expressly qualified in their entirety by this notice.

author: Claudia Lee
title: ‚ÄòThere has to be hope‚Äô: Croydon community leaders reflect on year of violence in the borough ‚Äì South London News
text: ‚ÄòThere has to be hope‚Äô: Croydon community leaders reflect on year of violence in the borough By Harrison Galliven, Local Democracy Reporter It‚Äôs fair to say Croydon has had a particularly tough year. While there have been 10 people killed in alleged murders in Croydon this year as well as a shooting right on the borough‚Äôs border with [Merton](https://londonnewsonline.co.uk/charity-fighting-poverty-in-merton-has-delivered-5-5-million-meals-to-families-in-need/), the September 27 tragedy of 15-year-old [Elianne Andam](https://londonnewsonline.co.uk/elianne-andam-thousands-gather-in-vigil-for-smart-and-charismatic-teenager-stabbed-to-death/) being stabbed to death in front of fellow school children was the clearest example of the borough‚Äôs continuing struggle with knife crime. But, Elianne‚Äôs funeral and vigil ‚Äì attended by 3,000 people including grime legend [Stormzy](https://londonnewsonline.co.uk/it-feels-like-a-full-circle-moment-stormzy-awarded-freedom-of-the-borough-by-home-council/) ‚Äì demonstrated a strong sense of community and an ability to come together in difficult moments. Andrew Brown, chief executive of the Croydon BME forum, the umbrella organisation for Croydon‚Äôs Black and Minority Ethnic voluntary and community sector, said: ‚ÄúThe alleged murder of Elianne has not just shocked the community but the wider world. ‚ÄúWhat was good was to see how the community came together during those turbulent two weeks.‚Äù Sadly, Elianne‚Äôs case was only one of several fatal knife crime incidents that occurred across the borough this year. Lucas Sutton, 22, was stabbed twice in the back and died from his wounds after being chased down a street in Croydon on May 23. Usmaan Mahmood, 20, was stabbed to death in Thornton Heath Recreation Ground in June. Felecia Cadore, 29, died in hospital five days after being stabbed in Grenaby Avenue in June. Bradley Hutchins was stabbed to death on North Walk, New Addington, on September 12. And less than five weeks after Elianne was killed, 19-year-old Mehak Sharma was stabbed to death at a property on Ash Tree Way, Shirley. The most recent knife killing in Croydon was [Michael Patrick Afonso Peixoto](https://londonnewsonline.co.uk/second-man-arrested-after-fatal-stabbing-of-27-year-old-in-croydon/), 27, who was stabbed to death on Mayfield Crescent, Thornton Heath, on December 19. Mr Brown said the response to Elianne‚Äôs murder was effective in part because the world‚Äôs attention was focused on the borough. He said: ‚ÄúWe were able to hold the borough‚Äôs various authorities to account because it was such a national story. ‚ÄúBut, a week later there was another girl who died from alleged domestic violence ‚Äì Mehak Sharma ‚Äì and we didn‚Äôt hear a lot from that one.‚Äù While Elianne‚Äôs death is still being investigated ‚Äì with a 17-year-old charged with murder ‚Äì Mr Brown pointed to wider failings within the borough. He said: ‚ÄúThe exclusions and managed moves of young boys in our schools are still very disproportionate toward young Black boys. ‚ÄúWe need to bring in local people and groups who know our boys and girls. Maybe even people who have been through it.‚Äù Anthony King, chair of My Ends, a community organisation that deals with youth violence, said: ‚ÄúThe community‚Äôs relationship with the Met and the council has increased and improved extensively.‚Äù Mr King focused on what he saw as the town centre‚Äôs dilapidated state as a reason for the chronic levels of crime. He said: ‚ÄúCroydon is boarded up and shops are leaving us. ‚ÄúAs the town centre looks more deprived and derelict, young people think it‚Äôs okay to treat it that way.‚Äù While the recent announcement of levelling up funding offers a glimmer of hope for the planned regeneration of Croydon town centre, both Mr King and Mr Brown agreed the funding must meet the needs of the communities. Mr Brown said: ‚ÄúThere has to be hope, if there wasn‚Äôt hope I wouldn‚Äôt be doing what I am doing. ‚ÄúWhat we have to remember is that the majority of young people are doing amazing things. We are still getting some of the highest GCSE and A-level marks in the whole of the country.‚Äù Pictured top: Anthony King outside the CVA resource centre in Croydon (Picture: Facundo Arrizabalaga) Subscribe to Blog via Email Everyone at the South London Press thanks you for your continued support. Former Housing Secretary Robert Jenrick has encouraged everyone in the country who can afford to do so to buy a newspaper, and told the Downing Street press briefing: ‚ÄúA free country needs a free press, and the newspapers of our country are under significant financial pressure‚Äù. If you can afford to do so, we would be so grateful if you can make a donation which will allow us to continue to bring stories to you, both in print and online. Or, please make cheques payable to ‚ÄúMSI Media Limited‚Äù and send by post to South London Press, Unit 112, 160 Bromley Road, Catford, London SE6 2NZ

author: Oscar Redondo
title: Demanda papa Francisco que causantes de guerras oigan a la conciencia
text:
Este mediod√≠a, desde la ventana de su estudio en el Palacio Apost√≥lico Vaticano, el sumo pont√≠fice demand√≥ en sus palabras ante decenas de miles de fieles y peregrinos reunidos en la Plaza de San Pedro, que ‚Äúquien tenga inter√©s en estos conflictos deber√≠a escuchar la voz de la conciencia‚Äù.
Se refiri√≥ de esa manera al conflicto entre Israel y Palestina, donde murieron ya m√°s de 21 mil personas en la Franja de Gaza, v√≠ctimas de bombardeos de Tel Aviv, as√≠ como a otros que se desarrollan en Ucrania, Sud√°n y otras regiones del mundo, e hizo alusi√≥n a la violencia contra los rohingyas en Myammar.
‚ÄúAl final de un a√±o, tengamos el coraje de preguntarnos: ¬øcu√°ntas vidas humanas se han perdido a causa de los conflictos armados? ¬øCu√°ntas muertes? ¬øY cu√°nta destrucci√≥n, cu√°nto sufrimiento, cu√°nta pobreza?‚Äù, manifest√≥ el obispo de Roma.
El papa lament√≥ tambi√©n que la celebraci√≥n de la Navidad en Nigeria estuviese marcada por graves actos de violencia en el estado de Plateau, que causaron numerosas v√≠ctimas.
‚ÄúRezo por ellos y sus familias. ¬°Que Dios libre a Nigeria de estos horrores!‚Äù expres√≥ Francisco en su condolencia por esa masacre, donde murieron unas 160 personas por ataques de pandillas criminales, que adem√°s causaron heridas a otros 300 pobladores, en su mayor√≠a campesinos cristianos y animistas.
‚ÄúRezo tambi√©n por quienes perdieron la vida en la explosi√≥n de un cami√≥n cisterna en Liberia‚Äù, expres√≥ Francisco, en alusi√≥n a ese accidente, acontecido el 26 de diciembre √∫ltimo, donde fallecieron 40 personas y otras 30 sufrieron graves quemaduras.
En el marco de las festividades por la Navidad y el A√±o Nuevo, el papa Francisco dirigi√≥ un saludo especial a las familias, como ‚Äúc√©lula fundamental de la sociedad‚Äù, y expres√≥ que a la misma ‚Äúdebemos defenderla y apoyarla siempre, ¬°siempre!‚Äù.
oda/ort

author: Adam Arnold
title: Elon Musk Claims All Human Data for AI Training is 'Exhausted
text:
Elon Musk Claims All Human Data for AI Training is 'Exhausted
Elon Musk Claims All Human Data for AI Training is 'Exhausted.
The tech boss advocates for the transition to self-learning synthetic data, although some experts caution that this may lead to a phenomenon known as 'model collapse'.
Elon Musk has stated that companies specializing in artificial intelligence have depleted their available data for training models and have essentially reached the limits of human knowledge. The wealthiest individual in the world indicated that technology firms may need to resort to utilizing "synthetic" data‚Äîinformation generated by AI models‚Äîto develop and refine new systems, a trend that is already occurring within this rapidly advancing field.
‚ÄúThe cumulative sum of human knowledge has been exhausted in AI training. That happened basically last year,‚Äù said Musk, who launched his own AI business, xAI, in 2023.
AI models, including the GPT-4o model that underlies the ChatGPT chatbot, undergo a training process utilizing a comprehensive dataset sourced from the internet. Through this process, these models learn to identify patterns within the data, enabling them to anticipate subsequent words in a sentence, for example.
In a recent interview broadcasted on his social media platform, X, Musk stated that the sole method to address the deficiency of source material for training new models is to transition to synthetic data generated by artificial intelligence.
Mentioning the exhaustion of data troves, he said: ‚ÄúThe only way to then supplement that is with synthetic data where ‚Ä¶ it will sort of write an essay or come up with a thesis and then will grade itself and ‚Ä¶ go through this process of self-learning.‚Äù
Meta, the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, has employed synthetic data to enhance its prominent Llama AI model, while Microsoft has similarly utilized AI-generated content for its Phi-4 model. Additionally, both Google and OpenAI, the organization responsible for ChatGPT, have incorporated synthetic data into their artificial intelligence initiatives.
Nevertheless, Musk cautioned that the propensity of AI models to produce "hallucinations"‚Äîa term referring to erroneous or nonsensical outputs‚Äîposes a significant risk to the synthetic data methodology.
During a livestreamed discussion with Mark Penn, the chairman of the advertising firm Stagwell, Musk remarked that hallucinations have rendered the use of artificial data "challenging," questioning how one can discern whether an output is a hallucination or a legitimate response.
Andrew Duncan, who serves as the director of foundational AI at the Alan Turing Institute in the UK, remarked that Musk's statement aligns with a recent scholarly article suggesting that the pool of publicly accessible data for AI models may be depleted as early as 2026. He further cautioned that excessive dependence on synthetic data could lead to "model collapse," a phenomenon characterized by a decline in the quality of model outputs.
‚ÄúWhen you start to feed a model synthetic stuff you start to get diminishing returns,‚Äù he said, with the risk that output is biased and lacking in creativity.
Duncan noted that the increase in AI-generated content available on the internet may lead to this material being incorporated into AI training datasets.
The management of high-quality data and the associated rights has emerged as a significant legal issue amid the rapid expansion of artificial intelligence. OpenAI acknowledged last year that developing tools like ChatGPT would not be feasible without utilizing copyrighted materials, prompting calls from the creative sectors and publishers for remuneration for the inclusion of their works in the training of these models.
LATEST: Elon Musk‚Äôs Daily, Hourly, and Per-Second Earnings Revealed.
Elon Musk's suggestion to shift to synthetic data for AI training raises serious concerns. While it may provide a temporary solution, the risks of "model collapse" cannot be ignored. Relying on AI-generated content could lead to diminishing returns, where outputs become increasingly biased and lack creativity.
As synthetic data becomes more prevalent, the quality of AI models may decline, resulting in unreliable or nonsensical responses. Additionally, the increasing use of AI-generated content in training datasets could exacerbate these issues, making it difficult to ensure the accuracy and originality of future AI systems.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: Catherine Salgado
title: ‚ÄòNew York for Hezbollah‚Äô and Jihad As an Ideological Fashion Fad ‚Äì PJ Media
text:
As protestors took to the streets of New York enthusiastically cheering the vicious Islamic terrorist group Hezbollah, it provided yet one more illustration of the fact that a pro-terrorist and anti-Israel attitude is America‚Äôs latest disturbing fashion. Its adherents neither understand nor want to understand the truth, merely throwing themselves into a popular fad.
College students wear keffiyehs the way they might wear trendy jeans or expensive sunglasses. These woke leftists, who love all the sexual perversions and feminist propaganda that Islam most strongly condemns, march in support of Islamic extremists who would happily rape and kill them on sight.
This highlights a serious danger that America faces: namely, that of a population that does not think critically or rationally but merely goes wild on whatever ideological claptrap is popular at the moment. Such individuals will believe anything their brainwashers tell them.
MRCTV reported :
In their latest demonstration, hundreds of violent Jihadis took to the streets, waving flags representing the Iranian-backed terrorist organizations Hezbollah and Hamas Tuesday night.
‚ÄúNew York for Hezbollah,‚Äù one demonstrator‚Äôs sign read as Islamist thugs hung a giant Hezbollah flag on a statue in Madison Square Park.
Breaking: Protestors are gathered in Manhattan waving Hezbollah flags while chanting ‚Äúfrom New York to Palestine, globalize the intifada,‚Äù
This is a mass call for suicide bombings, stabbings, and murders in the streets of America. These people must be condemned. pic.twitter.com/jEzNElMCcP
‚Äî Eyal Yakoby (@EYakoby) September 24, 2024 NOW: "Move cops, get out of the way!" Pro-Palestine Protesters chant as they walk through barricades that police set up to block them in vicinity of UN General Assembly. pic.twitter.com/d04y4Aaafl
‚Äî Oliya Scootercaster üõ¥ (@ScooterCasterNY) September 25, 2024 The mob assaulted and insulted police officers, and screamed, ‚ÄúFrom New York to Palestine, Globalize the Intifada!‚Äù
An Intifada consists of mass murders, bombing and stabbing attacks, which infamously targeted Israeli Jews during two deadly waves between the late 1980‚Äôs and early 2000‚Äôs. The mob is essentially calling to bring this terrorism to America. When they tell you who they are, believe them.
Indeed. No doubt some of these genocide glorifiers are Muslims who take their pro-terrorism holy texts seriously. Others are simply woke lackeys, as eager to cheer for Hezbollah as to watch the latest hit movie or perform the latest TikTok trend.
Related: What a Blast: Iran Bans Comms Devices After Hezbollah Pagers Strike
Again, this fad ideology poses a serious threat to America. Why? Because when a majority or even a strong minority of a population is so incapable of critical thinking and so brainwashed into believing whatever their favorite leaders tell them, these people can at a moment‚Äôs notice be inspired to attack innocent people and cause widespread destruction.
Americans have taken to the streets in support of a terrorist group that victimizes its own people and wants to wipe Israel off the map (Hezbollah). That is just after new reports of Hezbollah using civilians as human shields while almost constantly firing missiles at Israeli civilians . The American leftist violence and hatred won‚Äôt stop with support for Hezbollah. Remember, leftist leaders have labeled Trump supporters and traditional Catholics as ‚Äúdomestic terrorists‚Äù and devout Jews and Christians as ‚Äú extremists .‚Äù
üî¥ Thousands of Hezbollah rockets launched from Lebanon at Israel
üî¥ One million Israelis sheltering in bomb shelters
üî¥ 356 days of terror inflicted on Israeli children
This is the result. pic.twitter.com/Y6psmSv9CC
‚Äî Israel ◊ô◊©◊®◊ê◊ú (@Israel) September 26, 2024 Two radicals have already tried to assassinate Trump, and one almost succeeded , killing a Trump supporter in the process. A federal whistleblower alleged that at least five more ‚Äúassassin teams,‚Äù both foreign and domestic, are out for Trump‚Äôs blood. We saw in 2020 with the Summer of Communist Love and Mostly Peaceful Protests, which left over a billion dollars of damage and hundreds of casualties in its wake, how devastating leftist riots can be.
Related : Secret Service Knew of Trump Shooter 27 Minutes Before Shots Fired
Pro-Hamas rioters have stormed Capitol buildings and defaced public monuments and universities . Pro-Hamas and pro-Hezbollah rioters have attacked Jews and assaulted law enforcement. It does not matter if the protestors are completely delusional about the situation in the Middle East, completely blinded to the fact that ‚ÄúPalestinians‚Äù are majority pro-jihad and want to commit genocide , because, blinded or not, they still wreak havoc. Don‚Äôt forget that these radicals hate America as much as they hate Israel.
üö® Breaking: IDF revealed that Hezbollah pays high ‚Äúrent‚Äù to families who agree to store a ready-to-launch missile in one of their rooms in their homes.
Israel started attacking these missiles. Anyone who was stupid enough to agree to this Hezbollah scheme, will pay the price. pic.twitter.com/frZ3QLWl7v
‚Äî Dr. Eli David (@DrEliDavid) September 23, 2024 Hezbollah takes every single measure possible to harm Lebanese civilians.
We take every measure possible to ensure the safety of Lebanese civilians. pic.twitter.com/RKNRlYkmei
‚Äî Israel ◊ô◊©◊®◊ê◊ú (@Israel) September 23, 2024 Police didn‚Äôt murder George Floyd either, but propaganda about his death still changed American history. Democrats have used violence as a political tool for centuries , but the cult mentality is now exceptionally pronounced on the American left.
We need to vote individuals into office who will take a strong stand against pro-terrorist rioters and who will move to reform an education system that produces such fad-driven ideologues.

author: Hespress EN
title: Hopeful signs of rain and snowfall signal relief for Moroccan agriculture
text: After several weeks of notable temperature drops and frost waves (particularly at night and early morning), but no rain, Morocco‚Äôs critical water situation raised alarm bells. However, based on various global monitoring sites that track and update weather conditions, most forecasts anticipate rainfall in most regions of Morocco and snowfall in the highlands. According to these forecasts, Morocco could witness significant rainfall with the beginning of the new year 2024, as rain is expected to fall on Thursday and Friday, January 4 and 5, in many areas, such as Sais and the Great and Middle Atlas, all the way to Safi and the entire center of the Kingdom.‚Äù Monitoring maps showed expectations of ‚Äúvarying‚Äù rainfalls covering the regions of the north to the center, the east, and the countryside, then the High and Mediterranean Atlas, passing through the Marrakesh-Safi region. These findings were based on an analysis of climate forecasts for this week. Coldest nights of winter Hespress AR sought clarification from the General Directorate of Meteorology regarding the developments and expected weather situation in Morocco. According to the directorate, the weather during these days is characterized by cold, stable weather at night, with local frost formation during the morning and night over the country‚Äôs interior, eastern regions, and highlands. The directorate‚Äôs communications officer, affiliated with the Ministry of Equipment and Water, said ‚ÄúIt is normal because we are in winter, known to us in agricultural heritage as ‚ÄúLyali (coldest nights of winter),‚Äù considering this period is the peak of the cold season.‚Äù The Assyrian Ridge, a pressure zone centered on the Atlantic Ocean‚Äôs ‚ÄúA√ßores‚Äù islands and extending into the kingdom, has been influencing Morocco for the previous few days, contributing to the ‚Äústable weather‚Äù that was observed, according to the same official source. Rain clouds on the horizon The Moroccan Meteorological Directorate has confirmed the rain forecast, which was first reported by international weather monitoring websites. It states that beginning on Thursday evening, a humid north-westerly current will affect Morocco, creating an opening for the passage of rain clouds that will affect the country‚Äôs north and east. However, it should be noted that the amount of precipitation will be weak in the country‚Äôs central regions. As for next Friday (January 5), the latest forecast of the directorate states that ‚Äúthe weather will remain cloudy with some rainfalls possible in the northern and central regions, as well as the Mediterranean front and the regions of the High and Middle Atlas,‚Äù with expectations of snowfall expected in the High and Middle Atlas highlands on Friday. Positive impact on agriculture In a related context, Riad Ohtita, an agricultural expert, said that these expected rainfalls in the first week of January will have a generally positive impact on surface-level water and on the recovery of Morocco‚Äôs dams, which has reached an annual decrease estimated at 31 % at the end of 2023. Apart from dams, Ohtita emphasized in a statement to Hespress AR the significance of January‚Äôs precipitation and snowfall in maintaining the balance of water reserves devoted to agricultural activities, which form the foundation of the Moroccan economy. He also noted that the beneficial impacts are anticipated to impact several fall and winter crops (particularly potatoes, onions, and other root vegetables), as well as different kinds of pulses and nuts. Furthermore, it will act as an important catalyst for the planting of fruit trees, particularly citrus trees that are getting close to flowering. As for grains, the agricultural expert stated that these rainfalls will delight ‚Äúthe farmers of the western and northern regions, as well as some farmers in the Doukkala regions who took the initiative to plant and sow last October before the rainfalls were characterized by noticeable fluctuations over the past three months.‚Äù In light of the approaching preparations for Eid al-Adha his season, he reaffirmed the beneficial effects of rain and snow in terms of ‚Äúensuring the growth of plants and the abundance of fodder needed for livestock in the pastures,‚Äù and he speculated that ‚Äúthe prices of meat and some vegetables will decrease, but on the condition that cold and frost waves decrease and precipitation is regular.‚Äù Hopeful farmers Expert in rural engineering and member of the ‚ÄúWater Sub-Group,‚Äù Ahmad El Houti, stated that Morocco, and its farmers in particular, had been waiting eagerly for two months for significant rainfalls that vanished as soon as they started planting and fertilizing the ground. ‚ÄúEvery drop of water that falls in Morocco remains welcome and very much needed in this critical and sensitive circumstance. We ask and seek God‚Äôs help to provide us with more because the land is still thirsty and dry‚Äù he said. The expert confirmed that the rains this season are deemed ‚Äúdecisive,‚Äù as he thinks they would affect Moroccan farmers‚Äô mental health and the recuperation and successful conduct of their season in terms of crop growth and livestock breeding. On the other hand, the same speaker noted the urgent need for a longer period of rain on the horizon to fill the dams of the High and Middle Atlas and the rural areas, adding ‚ÄúRain should not lead us to comfortably manage the current water resources remaining in the dams or deep underground.‚Äù

author: Alexandra Hartman
title: Newsom's Meme War Against Trump
text:
California Sues Trump Administration Over National Guard Deployment ; Newsom Responds with Memes California Has Filed A Lawsuit Against The Trump Administration Following The deployment Of The National Guard To Los Angeles. Governor Gavin Newsom Is Using Memes To Voice His disapproval, Igniting A Social Media Firestorm.
California‚Äôs Legal Challenge Against Federal Intervention The State Of california Is Challenging The Federal Government‚Äôs Authority To Deploy The National Guard In Response To Protests. The Lawsuit Alleges Overreach And Violation of State Sovereignty.
Tensions Escalated After Demonstrations In Los Angeles, Prompted By Immigration Policies And I.C.E.Raids, Led To Clashes Between Protesters And Authorities. The Deployment Of Federal Troops, Over The Objections Of Local Officials, Triggered Immediate Legal Action.
Governor Newsom‚Äôs Meme Strategy California Governor Gavin Newsom Has Taken An Unconventional Approach By Using Memes To Criticize The Trump Administration‚Äôs Actions. Posts On His official And Personal Accounts Feature Popular Internet Trends And Pop Culture References.
One Post Featured The Phrase ‚ÄúFuck Around And Find Out,‚Äù While Another Used Taylor Swift‚Äôs ‚ÄúYou Need To Calm Down‚Äù To Mock The President. These Tactics Have Garnered Significant Attention, Boosting His Social Media Following.
Social Media Impact And Political Messaging Newsom‚Äôs Social Media Activity Has Led To A Significant Increase In His Online Presence.His Use Of memes Reflects A Growing Trend Among Politicians To Engage With Voters Directly through Digital Platforms, Bypassing Traditional Media Outlets.
However, It‚Äôs Important To Note That While Online Engagement Can Boost Visibility, It Does Not Always Translate Into Electoral Success. According To A 2023 Pew research Centre Study, While 65% of U.S. adults get news on social media, only a fraction consider it reliable.
Reactions And Public Opinion Reactions To newsom‚Äôs Meme Strategy Have Been Mixed. Some Applaud His Boldness In Standing Up To The Trump Administration, While Others Criticize The Use Of Informal Interaction For Serious Political Matters.
‚ÄúI Do Disagree With Newsom A Lot, But Him Standing Up To Tyranny And Standing With Your State Takes Some Serious Guts. Hats Off To You Newsom,‚Äù Wrote One User, Reflecting A Sentiment shared By Many Online.
Did You Know? Political Memes date back to the early 20th century, frequently enough used in cartoons and pamphlets. Today, they‚Äôve evolved into a powerful tool for rapid communication and mobilization.
The Broader Context: Politicians and social Media Newsom Joins A Growing List Of Politicians Who Are Using Social Media To Communicate Directly With The Public. Examples Include Kamala Harris‚Äôs ‚ÄúBrat Summer‚Äù Memes And Joe Biden‚Äôs ‚ÄúDark Brandon‚Äù Persona, Demonstrating The Increasing Importance Of Digital Engagement In Politics.
Political Meme Usage: A Comparison Politician Meme/Trend Purpose Impact Gavin Newsom ‚ÄúFuck Around And Find Out,‚Äù Taylor Swift Song Criticize Trump Administration Increased Social Media Following Kamala Harris ‚ÄúBrat Summer‚Äù Engage Younger Voters Generated Online Buzz Joe Biden ‚ÄúDark Brandon‚Äù Counter Negative perceptions Mixed Reactions The Future of Political Communication The Use Of Memes And Social Media By Politicians is highly likely To continue Growing.As Digital Platforms Become Increasingly Central To Public discourse, Politicians Must Adapt To These New Forms Of Communication To Reach Voters Effectively.
However, It Is Crucial To Maintain A Balance Between Engaging Content And Substantive Policy Discussions. The Challenge Lies In Using social media To Inform And Mobilize Voters Without Oversimplifying Complex Issues.
Pro Tip: When engaging in political discussions online, always verify the source of information and be mindful of echo chambers. Seek diverse perspectives to form a well-rounded opinion.
Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Why Is California Suing The Trump administration? A: California Is Suing the Trump Administration Over The Deployment Of The National Guard To Los Angeles, Citing concerns about Federal overreach. Q: How Is Governor Newsom Using Memes? A: Governor Newsom Is Using Memes To Criticize The Trump Administration‚Äôs Policies And Actions,Aiming To Engage A Wider Audience On Social Media. Q: What Impact Has Newsom‚Äôs Meme Strategy Had? A: Newsom‚Äôs Meme Strategy Has Significantly boosted His Social Media Presence, Attracting New Followers And Generating Online Discussion. Q: Are Memes An Effective Political Tool? A: While Memes Can Increase Visibility And Engagement,Their Effectiveness In Translating To Electoral Success Varies And Depends On Various Factors. Q: What Other Politicians Use Memes? A: Other Politicians, Such As Kamala Harris And Joe Biden, Have also Used Memes And Social Media Trends To Connect With Voters And Shape Their Public image. What Are Your Thoughts On Governor Newsom‚Äôs Use Of Memes? Do You Think This Is An Effective Way For Politicians To Communicate? Share Your Comments below!
How effective has Newsom‚Äôs meme strategy been in shaping public perception of his policies compared to Trump‚Äôs, and what are the potential long-term consequences of this digital approach to political campaigning?
Newsom‚Äôs Meme war Against Trump: Decoding the Digital Strategy California Governor Gavin Newsom has embraced the digital age, and in doing so, launched a full-blown meme war against former President Donald Trump. This strategic use of social media, notably through memes and viral content, aims to shape public perception and ultimately influence political discourse. This article explores Newsom‚Äôs tactics, analyzing the political dialog tools he employs, their effectiveness, and the broader implications of this online political battle against Trump. We‚Äôll delve into the context of the Newsom vs. trump showdown, covering everything from subtle digs to outright attacks, observing the intricacies of the political meme war .
The Foundation: Why Newsom is Targeting Trump The decision for governor Newsom to wage a meme war against Donald Trump is rooted in several strategic and political considerations.These factors include:
Raising National profile: Consistently engaging with a high-profile figure like Trump elevates Newsom‚Äôs visibility on a national stage,particularly in areas where he might want to have a larger voice,such as in debates about California politics on a national scale. Defining the Narrative: By proactively shaping the digital conversation,Newsom aims to influence public opinion and define the narrative surrounding key issues,thereby gaining an advantage,particularly if the political landscape shifts or election year approaches. Appealing to Younger Voters: Memes are a language spoken fluently by younger audiences. Newsom‚Äôs digital team utilizes this strategy to connect with and galvanize this demographic, especially in the 2024 election anticipation. Highlighting Policy Differences: Using contrasting memes can draw attention to key policy differences between Newsom‚Äôs management and Trump‚Äôs positions on topics such as climate change, social justice, and economic policies, and even their thoughts on government regulations . Analyzing the Memes: Tactics and Strategy Newsom and his digital team employ a variety of meme strategies to effectively counter Trump. These approaches include:
Direct Confrontation Directly challenging Trump‚Äôs statements and actions through visually engaging memes and satirical content. these can directly address Trump‚Äôs policies .
Highlighting Hypocrisy Creating memes that expose perceived inconsistencies or contradictions in Trump‚Äôs actions and words, focusing particularly on issues relevant to the American voter .
Using Humor and Satire Employing humor and satire to deconstruct Trump‚Äôs persona and political positions, making his messages less appealing to specific demographics or even the whole United States‚Äô population.
The effectiveness of these strategies depends on several variables, including timing, subject matter, and the target demographic.A key element involves staying reactive, but not passive. This includes the correct use of political messaging .
Meme Strategy Example Impact Direct Confrontation Memes directly refuting Trump‚Äôs specific claims on issues such as climate change or border security. Increased awareness and clarification of Newsom‚Äôs stance. Provides potential voters the ability to compare policies . Highlighting Hypocrisy memes juxtaposing Trump‚Äôs statements with his past actions, emphasizing contradictions. Dampens Trump‚Äôs credibility and encourages critical thinking. Using Humor & Satire Satirical content poking fun at Trump‚Äôs public appearances or rhetoric. Increases engagement and spreads a counter-narrative on social media. The Broader Implications of Political Memes The rise of political memes signifies a meaningful shift in political campaigning and digital marketing . These implications include:
Increased Engagement: Memes generate substantially high engagement rates compared to customary forms of political communication. Faster Dissemination: Memes can spread virally, allowing political messages to reach a vast audience rapidly, whether the audience wants it or not. Echo Chambers: Memes can contribute to the formation of echo chambers, reinforcing existing beliefs and limiting exposure to alternative viewpoints. Misinformation Concerns: The ease of creating and disseminating memes raises concerns about the spread of misinformation and the potential for manipulation. This is leading to a rise in the importance of social media campaigns .
Real-World Examples of Newsom‚Äôs Meme Warfare Newsom‚Äôs team has frequently used various platforms to launch counter-attacks and engage in the meme battle with Donald Trump. Such as, when Trump made statements about California, Newsom‚Äôs accounts were rapid to release memes and quick soundbites refuting his statements.
Another example involves utilizing memes to criticize specific policies advocated by trump or his administration, framing them in a way to make them appear out of touch with modern values.The ability to influence public opinion is a large part of the intent behind these memes.
First-hand experience indicates that the impact of the memes resonates deeply in social media. Frequently enough,the memes are shared and reposted widely,creating an organic outreach that traditional campaigns do not experience. This is a cost-effective way to boost political awareness .
Practical Tips: How to Analyze Political Memes Identify the Source: Always check the source of the meme. Verify the authenticity and the creator, including what their goal is, which will help prevent potential misinformation. Analyze the Message: Carefully examine the message conveyed by the meme,particularly the words and visuals used. Understand the use of the power of memes . Consider the Target Audience: determine who the meme is aimed at. consider how different demographics will interpret the message. Evaluate the Emotion: Find out what emotions this is encouraging ‚Äì hope, anger, frustration? How is the meme eliciting that? Check for Factuality: Verify the accuracy of any facts, claims, or statements made or referenced by the meme, using reliable sources. By following these tips, you can navigate the complex landscape of political discourse and make your opinion count and become better informed. The importance of understanding the power of memes in the digital public sphere is increasing as more and more modern campaigns, with media relations , make their way onto the internet.
This battle of digital communication will likely continue, with both sides refining and developing their techniques in preparation for future conflicts.
